Package academy.mindswap.ServerElements

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
academy.mindswap.ServerElements.ClientHandler
public class ClientHandler extends Object
This class is the client handler for the server.

      Changes the playing status of the client to true.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Changes the playing status of the client to false.

    • getMoveVote

      public char getMoveVote() throws IOException
      Receives the player vote to move and confirms the vote. If the client is offline, it returns -1 and kills the character.
      Returns:
      The vote.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getChestVote

      public char getChestVote() throws IOException
      Receives the player vote to open a chest and confirms the vote. If the client is offline, it returns -1 and kills the character.
      Returns:
      The vote.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • chooseMove

      public void chooseMove()
      Receives the player desired move to the turn and executes the needed procedures to the move. If the client is offline, it returns -1 and kills the character.
